episode.title: Smallen Up the Bezels
episode.rawTitle: 228: ‘Smallen Up the Bezels’ With Jason Snell
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest Jason Snell returns to the show. Topics do include mechanical keyboards, but do not -- I swear -- include baseball. Also: speculation on what Apple might do with the non-Pro MacBook lineup.
episode.showNotes:
Special guest Jason Snell returns to the show. Topics do include mechanical keyboards, but do not — I swear — include baseball. Also: speculation on what Apple might do with the non-Pro MacBook lineup.

Links:

  • Yours truly asking Tim Cook, Steve Jobs, and Bob Mansfield whether they used the bumper cases at the Antennagate press conference.
  • Matias Laptop Pro Wireless Keyboard.
  • Das Keyboard.
  • WASD keyboards.
    • WASD’s 6-key switch tester — great desk toy.
  • My favorite iPad (and iPhone) stand: Anker’s $11 Multi-Angle Stand.
  • Keyboard Maestro.
  • Jason writing for Macworld back in March: “MacBook Air: Why Won’t It Die?”.
  • Phil Schiller deftly shows how the 13-inch MacBook Pro is smaller than the 13-inch MacBook Air in October 2016.
  • Daring Fireball: “Let’s Really Think About This ‘New Low-Cost Laptop to Succeed MacBook Air’ Thing”.
  • Iconic photo of Missouri Journalism School lecture hall filled with students with MacBooks.

This episode of The Talk Show was edited by Caleb Sexton.
